contentfulPost.title: Podcast Episode 13: How To Make Your First Million Dollars In The Trades With Rooter Hero's John Akhoian

description.description: John Akhoian, CEO of Rooter Hero, shares the strategies that have helped turn his company into one of the most successful in the plumbing and HVAC world.

contentfulPost.snippetTitle: Podcast Ep. 13: How To Make Your First Million Dollars In The Trades
